title: James Cleverly – 2022 Comments on Meeting with Prime Minister of Kosovo
author: admin
summary: The comments made by James Cleverly, the Foreign Secretary, on Twitter on 31 October 2022.
content:
Today I met the Prime Minister of Kosovo, [@albinkurti](https://twitter.com/albinkurti) ahead of the Berlin Process Summit. We discussed the Kosovo-Serbia relationship and the need for courage and compromise to benefit people in both countries. UK-Kosovo relations are strong and long-standing
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
